proposed_strategy.name: Single Comprehensive Chunk
proposed_strategy.description: The entire Prapathaka is small enough to be contained within a single chunk, maximizing efficiency while adhering to structural boundaries.

execution_plan.description: The entire Second Prapathaka (Khandas 1 through 24) with commentary.

parsing_instructions.justification: The Prapathaka is divided into Khandas, which serve as the primary structural units for semantic parsing.

start_pattern.description: A new Khanda begins with a bolded heading indicating its number.

end_pattern.description: The end of a Khanda unit is consistently marked by the commentary concluding the section (Bhāṣyam or Prakāśikā closure for that Khanda).

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: The initial heading 'द्वितीयः प्रपाठकः' should be treated as the top-level structural marker but not part of the first Khanda's content.
